picard_mkdup.string_process:
process picard_mkdup {
    tag "PICARD MKDUP"
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/mkdup/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(sorted_bam)

    output:
    path "mkdup.bam", emit: mkdup_alignment
    path "marked_dupes_metrics.txt"

    script:
    """
    picard MarkDuplicates -I ${params.outdir}/bwa_aligned/${sorted_bam} -O mkdup.bam -M marked_dupes_metrics.txt
    """
}

tools_dico.name: Picard
tools_dico.description: A set of command line tools for manipulating high-throughput sequencing (HTS) data in formats such as SAM/BAM/CRAM and VCF. Available as a standalone program or within the GATK4 program.

samtools_view.string_process:
process samtools_view {
    tag "SAMTOOLS_VIEW on $aligned"
    cpus 4
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/bwa_aligned", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(aligned)

    output:
    path "aligned.bam", emit: aligned_bam                                                                        


    script:
    """
    samtools view -bS -@${task.cpus} ${aligned} > aligned.bam 
    """
}

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

fastqc.string_process:
process fastqc {
    tag "FASTQC on $pair_id 1 and 2"
    cpus 2
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/fastqc_${pair_id}_logs/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    tuple val(pair_id), path(reads)

    output:
    val(pair_id), emit: pair_ids
    tuple file("${pair_id}_1*.zip"), file("${pair_id}_2*.zip"), file("${pair_id}_1*.html"), file("${pair_id}_2*.html"), emit: fastqc_1


    script:
    """
    fastqc -t ${task.cpus} -q ${reads}
    """  
}

tools_dico.name: FastQC
tools_dico.description: This tool aims to provide a QC report which can spot problems or biases which originate either in the sequencer or in the starting library material. It can be run in one of two modes. It can either run as a stand alone interactive application for the immediate analysis of small numbers of FastQ files, or it can be run in a non-interactive mode where it would be suitable for integrating into a larger analysis pipeline for the systematic processing of large numbers of files.

picard_collectmetrics.string_process:
process picard_collectmetrics {
    tag "PICARD COLLECT METRICS"
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/mkdup/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(ref)
    path(marked_alignment)

    output:
    path "output.txt", emit: ref_dict

    script:
    """
    picard CollectAlignmentSummaryMetrics \
    -R ${ref} \
    -I ${marked_alignment} \
    -O output.txt
    """
}

tools_dico.name: Picard
tools_dico.description: A set of command line tools for manipulating high-throughput sequencing (HTS) data in formats such as SAM/BAM/CRAM and VCF. Available as a standalone program or within the GATK4 program.

bwa_mem.string_process:
process bwa_mem {
    tag "BWA MEM ALIGN"
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/bwa_aligned/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(ref)
    path(f1)
    path(f2)

    output:
    path "aligned.sam", emit: alignment

    script:
    """
    cp ${ref} ${params.outdir}/data/
    bwa mem -t 4 -R'@RG\\tID:1\\tLB:library\\tPL:Illumina\\tPU:lane1\\tSM:${params.sample_name}' ${params.outdir}/data/ref.fna ${f1} ${f2} > aligned.sam
    """
}

tools_dico.name: BWA
tools_dico.description: Fast, accurate, memory-efficient aligner for short and long sequencing reads

fastqc_2.string_process:
process fastqc_2 {
    tag "FASTQC2 on ${f1} AND ${f2}"
    cpus 2
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/fastqc_MERGED_logs/", mode: "copy"

    input:
    path(f1)
    path(f2)

    output:
    tuple file("*fastqc.zip"), file("*fastqc.html"), emit: fastqc_2

    script:
    """
    fastqc -t ${task.cpus} -q ${f1} ${f2}
    """
}

tools_dico.name: FastQC
tools_dico.description: This tool aims to provide a QC report which can spot problems or biases which originate either in the sequencer or in the starting library material. It can be run in one of two modes. It can either run as a stand alone interactive application for the immediate analysis of small numbers of FastQ files, or it can be run in a non-interactive mode where it would be suitable for integrating into a larger analysis pipeline for the systematic processing of large numbers of files.

samtools_index.string_process:
process samtools_index {
    tag "SAMTOOLS_INDEX on $aligned_sorted"
    cpus 4
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/bwa_aligned", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(aligned_sorted)

    output:
    path "aligned_sorted.bam.bai", emit: aligned_index                                                                        


    script:
    """
    samtools index -@${task.cpus} ${aligned_sorted}
    """
}

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

bwa_index.string_process:
process bwa_index {
    tag "BWA_INDEX on $ref"
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/data", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(ref)

    output:
    tuple path("ref.fna.sa"), path("ref.fna.bwt"), path("ref.fna.pac"), path("ref.fna.amb"), path("ref.fna.ann")                                                                         

    script:
    """
    bwa index ${ref}
    """
}

tools_dico.name: BWA
tools_dico.description: Fast, accurate, memory-efficient aligner for short and long sequencing reads

gatk_haplocaller.string_process:
process gatk_haplocaller {
    tag "GATK Haplo"
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/variant_called/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(reference)
    path(dict)
    path(ref_ind)
    path(sorted_bam)
    path(sorted_bam_bai)

    output:
    path "a_s_mkdup.vcf.gz", emit: v_called

                                     
    script:
    """
    cp ${dict} ref.dict
    gatk HaplotypeCaller -R ${reference} --sequence-dictionary ${dict} -I ${sorted_bam} -O a_s_mkdup.vcf.gz -ERC GVCF
    """
}
gatk_haplocaller.string_script:
"""
    cp ${dict} ref.dict
    gatk HaplotypeCaller -R ${reference} --sequence-dictionary ${dict} -I ${sorted_bam} -O a_s_mkdup.vcf.gz -ERC GVCF
    """

tools_dico.name: GATK
tools_dico.description:
The Genome Analysis Toolkit (GATK) is a set of bioinformatic tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing (HTS) and variant call format (VCF) data. The toolkit is well established for germline short variant discovery from whole genome and exome sequencing data. GATK4 expands functionality into copy number and somatic analyses and offers pipeline scripts for workflows.  

Version 4 (GATK4) is open-source at https://github.com/broadinstitute/gatk.

samtools_sort.string_process:
process samtools_sort {
    tag "SAMTOOLS_SORT on $aligned_bam"
    cpus 4
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/bwa_aligned", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(aligned_bam)

    output:
    path "aligned_sorted.bam", emit: aligned_sorted                                                                        


    script:
    """
    samtools sort -@${task.cpus} ${aligned_bam} -o aligned_sorted.bam 
    """
}

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

samtools_faidx.string_process:
process samtools_faidx {
    tag "SAMTOOLS FAIDX on $ref"
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/bwa_aligned", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(ref)

    output:
    path "${ref}.fai", emit: out_faidx

    script:
    """
    samtools faidx ${ref}
    """
}

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

trimmomatic.string_process:
process trimmomatic {
    tag "TRIMMING $pair_id 1 and 2"
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/TRIM_${pair_id}/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    tuple val(pair_id), path(reads)

    output:
    tuple path("${pair_id}_1P.fastq"), path("${pair_id}_2P.fastq"), emit: trim_paired
    tuple path("${pair_id}_1U.fastq"), path("${pair_id}_2U.fastq"), emit: trim_unpaired

    script:
    """
    echo "Runnning TRIM for ${reads}"

    trimmomatic PE -threads 4 -phred33 ${reads} \
    -baseout ${pair_id}.fastq \
    LEADING:10 TRAILING:10 SLIDINGWINDOW:4:20 MINLEN:36
    """
}
trimmomatic.string_script:
"""
    echo "Runnning TRIM for ${reads}"

    trimmomatic PE -threads 4 -phred33 ${reads} \
    -baseout ${pair_id}.fastq \
    LEADING:10 TRAILING:10 SLIDINGWINDOW:4:20 MINLEN:36
    """

tools_dico.name: Trimmomatic
tools_dico.description: A flexible read trimming tool for Illumina NGS data

bgzip.string_process:
process bgzip {
    tag "BGZIP ZIPPING"
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/variant_called/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(annotated_vcf)

    output:
    path "${annotated_vcf}.gz", emit: zipped_annotation

    script:
    """
    bgzip -c ${annotated_vcf} > ${annotated_vcf}.gz
    """
}

picard_createdict.string_process:
process picard_createdict {
    tag "PICARD CREATE DICT"
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(ref)

    output:
    path "${ref}.dict", emit: ref_dict

    script:
    """
    picard CreateSequenceDictionary -R ${ref} -O ${ref}.dict
    """
}

tools_dico.name: Picard
tools_dico.description: A set of command line tools for manipulating high-throughput sequencing (HTS) data in formats such as SAM/BAM/CRAM and VCF. Available as a standalone program or within the GATK4 program.

tabix.string_process:
process tabix {
    tag "TABIX INDEX STEP"
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/variant_called/", mode: 'copy'

    input:
    path(zipped_vcf)

    output:
    path "${zipped_vcf}.tbi", emit: zipped_index

    script:
    """
    tabix -p vcf ${zipped_vcf}
    """
}
